title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of an Android TV? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many advantages of Android TV and absolutely no disadvantage. An Android TV is a smart Tv with inbuilt special arrangement to get Android based TV shows and videos on TV. This is one kind of Smart TV. With an android TV, you can watch Live TV Shows without Set Top Box, Cable or Dish TV. Only Broadband Internet connection is required. Even there is no need to have Amazon Firestick, Chromecast, Mi Android Box etc. Some smart TV also capable to work with Internet to show Live TV Shows, Video etc through Broadband. However for better streaming Amazon Firestick, Chromecast, Mi Android Box etc may be required. In simple digital TV (Non Smart TV) Amazon Firestick, Chromecast, Mi Android Box etc is necessarily required to watch Live TV Shows or Video.

There are many advantages and a few disadvantages of Android TV which are given below: Advantages: Android TV can turn any TV into a smart TV that comes at a reasonable price.It's a compatible device providing multiple apps. You can download Netflix, gaming apps, or more streaming apps.It features google assistant that gives you accessibility to use your voice to search.Disadvantages: You must know the Android interface to operate the TV.With Android TV, there is a fear of security since an Android TV will add another device to your TV.You will find these above-given advantages on any TV. But you can’t ignore the advantages of Android TV. Since it gives you ease to transfer files and access to play games, watch shows, series, motion pictures, streaming apps.
